alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 29 at 4:31PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Box Elder and northeastern Tooele Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 431 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Delle, or 19 miles northwest of Grantsville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Delle and Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 69 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys
